definition: (of a roof) having two slopes on all sides with the lower slope steeper than the upper, a hip roof having two slopes on each side
details:
adjective
- (of a roof) having two slopes on all sides with the lower slope steeper than the upper
= example: (of a roof) having two slopes on all sides with the lower slope steeper than the upper
noun
- a hip roof having two slopes on each side
= synonyms: mansard roof
